name: Wonderland Preschool & Child Care
description: Licensed child care center providing preschool and child care services in London, Kentucky. Medium-sized center with capacity for 36 children. Participates in subsidized child care program and accepts vouchers. Offers both multiple children care and single child care services in a warm and welcoming environment.
source: Verified from Yelp, CareLuLu, Daycare.com, and multiple child care directories
notes: Licensed child care center with capacity for 36 children. Participates in subsidized child care program and accepts vouchers. Provides both preschool and child care services in a medium-sized center setting.
verification_notes: Information verified across multiple sources including Yelp, CareLuLu, Daycare.com, and other child care directories. Phone number and address confirmed. Center is licensed and participates in subsidized child care programs.
